content.raw:
It looks like the behavior of FreeImage for jpeg images has changed with its recent 3.18 release on homebrew. I noticed this due to a regression in gazebo's `Image_TEST`, which uses `wood.jpg`, though the `Image_TEST` in ign-common doesn't show this regression because it uses `cordless_drill.png`. I'm reporting it here because this is the target of future development. We could reproduce the failure by adding a jpeg test to `Image_TEST` in this repo.

Regression in gazebo homebrew test on August 9

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo7-homebrew-amd64/253/testReport/(root)/ImageTest/Image/

freeimage formula updated on August 1

* https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/commit/9f999affd653e2420671c1bc7463a21069f21144

It looks like the behavior of FreeImage for jpeg images has changed with its recent 3.18 release on homebrew. I noticed this due to a regression in gazebo's Image_TEST, which uses wood.jpg, though the Image_TEST in ign-common doesn't show this regression because it uses cordless_drill.png. I'm reporting it here because this is the target of future development. We could reproduce the failure by adding a jpeg test to Image_TEST in this repo.
